name: ShowdownModules [Sun & Moon] | Pokémon Showdown
description:
Sun and Moon based Battle UI module for Pokémon Showdown

This style project aims to improve the Pokémon Showdown default experience by including many quality-of-life visual features, along with making the in-battle interface similar to the Pokémon Sun & Moon UI.

This module does not affect the rest of the Pokémon Showdown interface anywhere outside of battle, keeping the vanilla feel of the website.

Features of this style include:
- Custom HP Bars (inspired by: Ahmad Bamba)
https://userstyles.org/styles/135046/simple-hp-bars-pokemon-showdown
- Custom move buttons and animations
- Clearer battle backgrounds
- Battle camera movement
- Better weather animation (credits to: TheLoss Because)
https://userstyles.org/styles/176018/the-phenomenal-style-pokemon-showdown

Planned features:
- Improved and themed tooltips
- HD Pokémon Models (optional)
- HD Battle Backgrounds (optional)
- Animated terrain alterations
- Improved turn and weather counters
